content:
Our break-out schedule for the connectathon is as follows:
Wed: 17:30-18:30 Compositional Questionnaires (this one immediately followed the kickoff and is now over)
Thur: 10:30-12:00 Intro to SDC
Thur: 17:00-18:00 Regular SDC call
Fri: 10:30-12:00 Overview of various form builders & renderers
All times are Eastern

We may add additional breakouts if topics come up that warrant discussion

I would be interested in discussing pre-populate error conditions behaviours.
i.e. how to let an app that is receiving results of a pre-pop that it didn't provide all the requested parameters (e.g. was no organization to pass in, but was still able to pre-pop things)
Which leads me to the question, should we have an optional or mandatory boolean extension in here?

<extension url="http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/sdc/StructureDefinition/sdc-questionnaire-launchContext" >
   <extension url="name" >
      <valueId value="LaunchOrganization"/>
   </extension>
   <extension url="type" >
      <valueCode value="Organization"/>
   </extension>
   <extension url="description" >
      <valueString value="The organization of the practitioner that is in context, used to pre-populate this form"/>
   </extension>
</extension>
I booked our report-out session (on the main Webinar link) for 2:30 Eastern
When will be the next break-out session?
There will be a session to work on SDC tracker items at 5.
